header.title: docbuilder

description.p: DocBuilder provides functionality for generating HTML documentation for Erlang modules and Erlang/OTP applications from XML source code and/or EDoc comments in Erlang source code.

section.title: Limitations
section.p: DocBuilder is primarily intended for generating documentation for Erlang/OTP itself. That is, no attempt has been made to create a tool suitable for generating documentation in general.
